Plot:

A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers, including Luke (Malambri) and
Natalie (Vinson), team up with NYU freshman Moose (Sevani), and find themselves
pitted against the world\'s best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown that will
change their lives forever.
